about.title: About MD Flashcards
description: MD Flashcards can be used for making all types of text-based flashcards, but specifically it's geared towards learning new software technologies with its support for formatted code snippets.
To create a code-formatted flashcard, enclose your code block in triple backticks (```) while writing the name the enclosed language immediately following the opening series of backticks as follows:

welcome.title: Welcome to MD FLashcards!
description: Make web-based flashcards that support markdown and code snippets.
Log in to get started or checkout our public Flashcard Library.

CREATE_NEW_CARD.failure: Network error. Failed to create card.

BULK_CREATE_CARDS.failure: Network error. Failed to create cards from CSV.

EDIT_CARD.failure: Network error. Failed to update card.

DELETE_CARD.failure: Network error. Failed to delete card.

CREATE_NEW_CARD_SET.failure: Network error. Failed to create new set.

CREATE_NEW_CARD_GROUP.failure: Network error. Failed to create new group.

tooltips.csvUpload: You can create flashcards by uploading your own CSV (comma-separated values) file that contains a question and answer in each row. Ensure that the header row is written as: question,answer
